item.title: Loose cover on pavement, 26th September
item.description:
Unsure if manhole cover Loose, rocking cover in middle of pavement Looks to have been previously marked for repair as has a yellow arrow on it For the past year has been covered with a yellow plastic covering that has also come loose and moved Unable to attach photo but it is near the crossing on the Camden Road / Camden Park Road corner
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 201 - 203, Camden Road, Tufnell Park, London

item.title: Illegaly parked cargo bike, 26th September
item.description:
Large cargo bike chained to post on very narrow pavement in Evesham Walk SE5 and causing an obstruction. Lady with motorised wheelchair can’t get past, postman and cart ditto. Owner has variously chained this to railings of Jenny Lee House for long periods, then to soon to be demolished Love Walk Mission, now dumped in front of someone’s doorstep. Please remove.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 2, Evesham Walk, Camberwell, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large box with tv inside and other boxes/rubbish, 26th September
item.description:
